creditline: Lent by Arthur and Lucille Weiss
description: One of a matched pair of earspools in a group of 3 earspools. The matched pair of earspools have flared rims and are made of ceramic. The single earspool in the group is drilled at side for affixment and is made of light and dark green mottled stone.
title: Earspool, one of a pair
